title: Globus Spirits Standalone December 2025 Net Sales at Rs 716.39 crore, up 19.1% Y-o-Y
author: Broker Research
content:
Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for Globus Spirits are:Net Sales at Rs 716.39 crore in December 2025 up 19.1% from Rs. 601.51 crore in December 2024. Quarterly Net Profit at Rs. 31.42 crore in December 2025 up 4268.18% from Rs. 0.72 crore in December 2024. EBITDA stands at Rs. 78.18 crore in December 2025 up 137.99% from Rs. 32.85 crore in December 2024. Globus Spirits EPS has increased to Rs. 10.85 in December 2025 from Rs. 0.25 in December 2024. Globus Spirits shares closed at 1,021.30 on January 09, 2026 (NSE) and has given -0.52% returns over the last 6 months and 33.93% over the last 12 months.
